ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters
Class QuestionListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  
      ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.adapters.QuestionListAdapter

public class QuestionListAdapter
extends

The Class QuestionListAdapter. Connects a list of questions to the SuperFragment Handles favoriting & adding to the reading list Handles switching to the AddAAnswerActivity & calling the WriteReplyDialogFragment to be displayed

Version:
0.5

group 10
